scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "pnpm --filter wrapper-backend dev" "pnpm --filter wrapper-frontend dev"
scripts.build: pnpm --filter wrapper-backend build && pnpm --filter wrapper-frontend build
scripts.start: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "pnpm --filter wrapper-backend start" "pnpm --filter wrapper-frontend start"
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter wrapper-backend lint && pnpm --filter wrapper-frontend lint
scripts.test: pnpm --filter wrapper-backend test && pnpm --filter wrapper-frontend test
